name: Comet Crasher (m4lfunction, ta1ce)
description:
We can finally call this a finished product, word is done and we move on to other frontiers. I hope you guys enjoy.

"This takes rockets and comets to a whole new level!"

- Some guy

"This is awesome!!!"

-Defenetly not the same guy

Controll the rocket up or down. Be sure to collect the green asteroids and evade the red.
